thread.title: Silvergate Plastics to launch new 3D printing range at TCT Show + Personalize
thread.title_full: Silvergate Plastics to launch new 3D printing range at TCT Show + Personalize

title: Silvergate Plastics to launch new 3D printing range at TCT Show + Personalize
text:
Silvergate Plastics to launch new 3D printing range at TCT Show + Personalize 24 September 2015 Expand 
via Silvergate Plastics The UK’s largest manufacturer of custom colour masterbatches, Silvergate Plastics , is to launch its brand new range of masterbatches developed specifically for 3D printing at this year’s TCT Show + Personalize. 
The North Wales-based company has developed an innovative range of colour and additive masterbatches designed for 3D printing and has the ability to customise any colour for both ABS and PLA polymers. The advanced ingredients compatible for use in this special range of masterbatch include Optiblo, the company’s advanced formula for optimising efficiencies and product performance during manufacture, along with laser marking, fragrant and antimicrobial additives. 
Silvergate Plastics is keen to support this burgeoning industry by developing performance-enhancing colours and additives. 
The team recently commented that it is “looking forward to meeting manufacturers, developers and thought leaders at the TCT Show to share best practices and discuss the latest advancements in technology that are driving economic growth in this sector.” 
Silvergate Plastics will be exhibiting at the TCT Show + Personalize 2015 on Stand D19 at the NEC Birmingham on 30th September to 1st October 2015. To visit Silvergate Plastics and find out more, register for free . Tags
